description: A woman who was a passenger in a taxi was badly hurt in a crash on the A127 in Essex, police say.
title: A127 crash: Taxi passenger hurt in collision with broken-down car
title_page: A127 crash: Taxi passenger hurt in collision with broken-down car - BBC News
maintext:
A woman has been taken to hospital with serious injuries following a crash between a taxi and a broken-down stationary vehicle.
Essex Police said the crash took place on the A127 at Laindon just after 20:05 GMT on 1 March.
A taxi and a broken-down BMW Z4 were involved in the collision between the Mayflower retail park and the Burches roundabout, police said.
One woman who was a passenger in the taxi was left with serious injuries to her face and was taken to hospital for treatment.
